I think you might enjoy "The Queen"! It's a fascinating look at the British monarchy and Queen Elizabeth II's reaction to the death of Princess Diana. Helen Mirren gives an incredible performance as the monarch, bringing depth and nuance to the role.

If you're in the mood for something a bit more laid-back, I'd also recommend "Trees Lounge". This 90s indie film has a great cast, including Steve Buscemi and Carol Kane, and explores themes of small-town life and redemption.
